summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Seattle Boulevard, from Judkins Street to Ninth Avenue South; Ninth Avenue South, from Seattle Boulevard on the north to Seattle Boulevard on the South; Seattle Boulevard, from Ninth Avenue South to Eighth Avenue South, and Eighth Avenue South, from Seattle Boulevard to Court Street, all in the City of Seattle, by the construction of an asphalt roadway thereon, in accordance with Resolution No. 667 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Immediate Payment," under the provisions of Ordinance No. 5693 of said city, approved December 8, 1899.
